content: Free plumbing service! Call now for a special discount! Visit www.spamsite.com!
Hello! This is XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services today?
Get a free quote now! Call 123-456-7890! Best prices guaranteed!

It seems like this number is sending promotional spam messages. For quality service assistance, please contact us without advertising. I'm marking this conversation as spam and will not respond further. Thank you!
